OOC: And the Bodicons have already combined, and then the Lavacons could co=
mbine but wouldn't be very successful because Fenox isn't with them.
  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: CYBERWOLF4 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

  Sent: Monday, April 02, 2001 11:44 PM
  Subject: Re: CF Skimirsh


  The=
n the protectobots combine, then the Predacons combine, (Am I senseing a pa=
ttern here?)
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: dcoburn 
    To: n=
bwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, April 01, 2001 11:29 AM
    Subjec=
t: Re: CF Skimirsh


    OOC: Hehe Cyberwolf, don't forget there is also a =
neautral bounty hunter(Quatro) there.  And watch out, the Terrorcons can fo=
rm Abominus anytime!
    ::Cutthroat/Triggerhappy/Bodicons/Composer/Quatro:=
:

        Cutthroat is suddenly blinded by smoke.  He waved it away, and w=
as enraged.

        "Cutthroat slag Autobot trash buckets!!!!" Cutthroat y=
elled.

        Cutthroat shot a big stream of flame from his mouth at the =
CF.
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          Triggerhappy =
cackled, then fired a compressed air shot from Blowpipe at the CF.
    ~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
          The Bodicons saw this "Al=
liance" coming to help the Maximals.

          "COMBINE!!!!!!!!" Decapitro=
n yelled.

          The other 4 Bodicons got close to Decapitron.  Then, t=
heir bodies all got into the right positions and they formed a huge gestalt=
 warrior called Surgital.

           "It's time for your operation!!!!" Su=
rgital yelled down at the Alliance members.

           The Bodicons all ag=
reed on a target.  Surgital's hand converted into a massive spinning saw.  =
He lowered his hand down and attempted to cut Megaton in half.
    ~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Composer eventually arrived =
at the scene.  He landed beside Zardus.

           "My leader, I'm here to=
 help you aid the Maximals.  Wheeljack is coming as well," Composer informe=
d Zardus of his arrival.
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  =
        Quatro could hear the battle all around him.  Quatro went outside a=
nd saw the gestalt warrior Surgital, and the Alliance coming to help Maxima=
ls.

          "The Maximals and their allies can fend off the Decepticons =
by themselves.  I've got a feeling that this is a big trick.  I have to see=
 Megatron," Quatro said to himself.

          Quatro ran around, trying to=
 be stealthy so that nobody could see him.  He didn't want to waste power o=
n using his stealth mode here.  Then, when he was away from the battle, he =
did a data search on the Decepticons to try and find their base. 

        =
   "Decepticon Base:Dark Avian," Quatro said aloud.

           Quatro tran=
sformed to hoverbike mode, and speeded off towards the Dark Avian.
